      Subclasses of PersistenceException in de.hsrm.swt02.persistence.exceptions 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AlreadyExistsException
      Exception dealing with whenever something is requested and it's alread there.
      class  FormNotExistentException
      Exception dealing with whenever a form is requested and it's not there.
      class  ItemNotExistentException
      Exception dealing with whenever an item is requested and it's not there.
      class  NotExistentException
      Exception dealing with whenever something is requested and not there.
      class  RoleAlreadyExistsException
      Exception dealing with whenever an user is requested and it's already there.
      class  RoleNotExistentException
      Exception for when the requested role is not there.
      class  StepNotExistentException
      Exception for StepNotExistentExceptionhandling.
      class  StorageFailedException
      Exception for StorageFailedExceptionhandling.
      class  UserAlreadyExistsException
      Exception dealing with whenever an user is requested and it's already there.
      class  UserHasAlreadyRoleException
      Exception if we want to add a role to an user and he's already there.
      class  UserNotExistentException
      Exception dealing with whenever a user is requested and it's not there.
      class  WorkflowNotExistentException
      Exception for when the requested workflow is not there.
